uvi.description:
smackfs: restrict bytes count in smk_set_cipso()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.133 by commit 135122f174c357b7a3e58f40fa5792156c5e93e6. For more details please see the references link.
